value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Everyone, get ready to move! Just
like last year, it's time for a legendary
rite performed in another world...$k$pto bring forth Brave Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Heroes born from the wishes of
mankind... I wonder what they'll be
like this time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I have learned one thing...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's wrong? Meeting new Heroes
is always a reason to be happy! But
you look...uncomfortable.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We've had a report that one of the
Heroes is... Well, it's no one I ever
would have anticipated.$k$p$Sbs2000|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What? Who could it be?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The princess of the Emblian Empire...
Veronica.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|A rite that summons Brave Heroes...$k$pThis is just a distraction from finding
my brother. I need to resume my
search.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|I am sorry to hear that. I have also
been separated from someone very
dear to me.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|I miss him. Terribly. I am so lonely...$k$pAll I have is this book he gave me.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|I carry the sword my love gave me,
and with that, I feel that he is still by
my side...$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|You do understand...$k$pThe summoner is here! All right, then.
We'll show off our power as Brave
Heroes!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|We should retreat for now, Princess
Veronica.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|OK. If you say so.$k$p$Sbs150|
